changes.reasoning: Create Claude marketplace plugin structure at packages/claude-plugin/. Includes plugin.json metadata, SKILL.md skill definition, stop-enforcement.json hook, README documentation, and package.json for workspace integration. This packages the codewalk functionality for distribution via the Claude marketplace.
Rename tracking directory from .codewalker/ to .codewalk/ for consistent branding with the 'codewalk' name used throughout the project.

Rename npm packages from @codewalker/* to @codewalk/* for consistent branding. Updated package.json files in root, packages/types, apps/web, and apps/cli, plus all import statements referencing @codewalker/types.
Update all UI text and documentation from 'CodeWalker' to 'codewalk' for consistent branding throughout the application.
Update CLI init command to use codewalk naming. Changed skill file name, directory name, template content, console output messages, and hook prompts from codewalker to codewalk.
Update CLI visualize command to watch .codewalk/ directory instead of .codewalker/ for new tracking files.
Rename and update local Claude configuration files from codewalker to codewalk naming.
